mapper.select: SELECT C.C_IDX, W.W_NAME , S.S_NAME, C.C_COUNT, WL.W_PRICE, U.U_NO, C.C_COUNT * WL.W_PRICE AS C_ALLPRICE FROM CART C LEFT JOIN WINE W ON C.W_NO = W.W_NO LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON C.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON C.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN TUSER U ON C.U_NO = U.U_NO WHERE U.U_NO = #{u_no}
